snippet: City Councilman Ydanis Rodriguez went free after prosecutors said they could not make their case because they lacked testimony from an officer Mr. Rodriguez was accused of scuffling with.
abstract: City Councilman Ydanis Rodriguez went free after prosecutors said they could not make their case because they lacked testimony from an officer Mr. Rodriguez was accused of scuffling with.

headline.main: Councilman Cleared of Charges in Arrest Near Zuccotti Park
